reduceUTerms

public XPolynomial reduceUTerms(boolean bTotalReduction)
Reduction of this polynomial by division it with powers of u-variables. Division of denominators of fractions that are coefficients of x-terms corresponds to multiplying this polynomial by these powers of u-variables. Division of numerators can be done in two ways - to totally remove common powers of u-variables or to leave just one of each u-variable in numerators. The former will be done when making polynomials for constructions where we assume that NDG conditions are satisfied and we can safely remove all these additional u-powers. The latter will be used when translating NDG conditions from polynomial to user-friendly form.

Parameters:
bTotalReduction - Flag which determines if total reduction of u-powers from numerators will be done
Returns:
This polynomial, which is result of operation, if successful and null otherwise

reduceByUTermDivision

public XPolynomial reduceByUTermDivision()
Method for reduction of x-polynomial by division of each u-coefficient (fraction) by simple common divisor of form A/B where A and B are u-terms. A is actually GCD of all numerators from coefficients of x-terms and B is GCD of all denominators. This polynomial will be changed at the end of operation. Also, the coefficient from leading u-term of numerator of u-fraction from leading x-term will be taken to divide all x-terms in order to get monic form of x-polynomial. E.g. polynomial (u2u1 + u1)x2/(u3^2 + u3u2) + (u1^2 + u1)x1/(u4u3 - u3) will be reduced by division with u1/u3 to following polynomial: (u2 + 1)x2/(u3 + u2) + (u1 + 1)x1/(u4 - 1).

Returns:
This polynomial, which is result of operation, if successful and null otherwise

getLeadingExpAndCoeff

private int getLeadingExpAndCoeff(int varIndex,
                                  int expDecr,
                                  XPolynomial leadingCoeff)
Method used in pseudo reminder calculation. It searches for all terms in this polynomial that contain variable with given index and maximal possible exponent of that variable in this polynomial.

Parameters:
varIndex - Index of x variable that is searched for.
expDecr - Exponent decrement value that is applied to given variable when making leading coefficient. Pure leading coefficient doesn't contain power of variable with given index, but sometimes it is necessary to multiply that coefficient with smaller power of this variable and that is why this argument is used for; like a kind of efficient work - in one pass to find leading coefficient and multiply it with power of variable. Naturally, this value is non-negative, thus a value of -1 has meaning to make pure leading coefficient, i.e. remove power of given variable from its terms. This value can be at the most equals to maximal exponent of given variable. When searching for maximal exponent, this value must be at least equals to exponent decrement.
leadingCoeff - Polynomial which is standing as coefficient near maximal power of given variable; it is eventually multiplied by smaller power of that variable.
Returns:
Method returns maximal exponent of given variable in this polynomial, but it also retrieves its leading coefficient through last argument. In case of error, -1 is returned since exponent of variable in polynomial is non-negative value. Zero as return value is special case - that means that variable with given index is not found in this polynomial, or that all its exponents are not greater than decrement. In both cases whole this polynomial will represent leading coefficient and that will provide the end of successive pseudo division processes. If decrement is -1, return value of zero only has meaning that variable is not found in polynomial at all.

pseudoReminder

public XPolynomial pseudoReminder(XPolynomial p,
                                  int varIndex)
Method for calculation of pseudo reminder of this polynomial with another passed in polynomial over variable with passed in index.

Parameters:
p - Polynomial which this polynomial is pseudo divided by
varIndex - Index of variable over which pseudo division is performed
Returns:
This polynomial which is result of operation - pseudo reminder (this = prem(this, p, varIndex)), or null in case of error

getLeadingExp

public int getLeadingExp(int varIndex)
Method that gives greatest exponent of given variable in this polynomial.

Parameters:
varIndex - Index of variable that is searched for
Returns:
Greatest exponent of variable (0 means polynomial doesn't contain this variable) or error code (< 0)

getLeadingCoefficientOfVariable

public XPolynomial getLeadingCoefficientOfVariable(int xVarIndex)
Method that returns polynomial which is leading coefficient in this polynomial, of given x-variable. E.g. in polynomial
x5^4*x4^3*x3 + x4^2*x3^2 - 2u1*x3^2*x2^4 + (3u3^4 - u1)*x3^2*x2 + x2*x1 + 4u2 = 0
leading coefficient of variable x3 is: x4^2 - 2u1*x2^4 + (3u3^4 - u1)*x2

Parameters:
xVarIndex - Index of x-variable whose leading coefficient is calculated.
Returns:
X-polynomial which is leading coefficient in this polynomial, of given x-variable

extractAllVariables

public java.util.Vector<UXVariable> extractAllVariables()
Method that extracts all u and x variables from this polynomial.

Returns:
List of all u and x variables from this polynomial.

matchesNDGCPolynomial

public boolean matchesNDGCPolynomial(XPolynomial ndgcPoly)
Method that checks if this polynomial matches passed in polynomial which is algebraic form of some NDG condition.

Parameters:
ndgcPoly - Polynomial form of NDG condition - non-zero polynomial which is reduced by u-term division (removed sufficient u-terms)
Returns:
True if this polynomial corresponds to passed in polynomial form of NDG condition.
